mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu ( PK_MENU_SEQ, PK_AUTH_SEQ, UPPER_MENU_NO, LEVEL, MENU_NAME, LINK_URL, PATH, USE_YN, DEL_YN, REGIST_ID, REGIST_DT, UPDATE_ID, UPDATE_DT ) VALUES ( IFNULL(#{pkMenuSeq}, null), #{pkAuthSeq}, #{upperMenuNo}, #{level}, #{menuName}, #{linkUrl}, #{path}, #{useYn}, #{delYn}, #{registId}, SYSDATE(), #{updateId}, SYSDATE() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE PK_MENU_SEQ = PK_MENU_SEQ, PK_AUTH_SEQ = #{pkAuthSeq}, UPPER_MENU_NO = #{upperMenuNo}, LEVEL = #{level}, MENU_NAME = #{menuName}, LINK_URL = #{linkUrl}, PATH = #{path}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, DEL_YN = #{delYn}, UPDATE_ID = #{updateId}, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE()
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM menu WHERE PK_AUTH_SEQ>=#{pkAuthSeq} AND USE_YN == "Y" AND DEL_YN = "N"
SELECT * FROM menu WHERE PK_AUTH_SEQ>=#{pkAuthSeq} AND DEL_YN = "N"
